headline.main: THE SICILIAN INSURRECTION.; THE QUESTION OF TURKEY. GREAT BRITAIN. FRANCE. SPAIN. ITALY. GENERAL NEWS. AUSTRIA. PRUSSIA. DENMARK. CHINA. The Latest by Telegraph to Southampton.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have authentic accounts from Palermo, dated the 16th. GARIBALDI was on the night of the 13th at Salemi; on the 14th at Calata Fimi; on the 15th at Alcamo. He is said to have repulsed the royal troops at Pioppo a place I cannot find in the excellent map before me, in which otherwise the line of march is distinctly traceable.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. REYNOLDS, of New-York, (Anti-Lecompton Dem.,) from the Committee on the Judiciary, reported a bill providing that any United States Marshal, Deputy Marshal, or other ministerial officer, who shall permit the escape of criminals in their custody, whether charged with offences under the laws of the United States, or those of a foreign ...

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN GERMANY.; Suicide of Count Szechenyl--The Austrian Government and Hungary--Field-Marshal Eynatten and his Accomplices--The New Austrian Loan--European Financial Affairs and American Securities--Suicide ofBaron von Bruck--The Emperor's Journey, and the Helplessness of the Austrian Government--Archduke Stephen, the New Palatine of Hungary--The Hessian Question.

docs.lead_paragraph: The suicide of the Hungarian patriot and hero, Count SZECHENYI, is the most important and striking among the many sad events which characterize the decay of the Austrian Empire. Count STEPHEN SZECHENYI was born Sept. 21, 1791, in Vienna, and was educated as a soldier.

headline.main: BOARD OF PUBLIC CHARITIES AND PUNISHMENT.; DECREASE IN THE INSTITUTIONS BAD CONDITION OF THE LUNATIC ASYLUM WHAT THE NEW COMMISSIONERS INTEND TO DO. POLICE COMMISSIONERS. DIRTY BUILDINGS INTOXICATED PERSONS THE NEW SUPERINTENDENT SWORN IN. THE BUILDING LAW. EXAMINATION OF CANDIDATES APPOINTMENT OF INSPECTORS SWEARING THEM IN. OFFICE OF THE TAX RECEIVER. CLOSING DAY OF TAX PAYMENTS. MAYOR'S OFFICE. THE HEALTH COMMISSIONERS. A SECRET SESSION.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Commissioners of Public Charities and Punishment met yesterday afternoon, when the usual weekly report was received, showing that the number of inmates in the several Institutions on the 26th inst. was 9,028 a decrease of 63 compared with the previous report.

docs.snippet: The steamship St. Louis, Capt. CAVENDY, from New-Orleans on the 24th, stopping at Havana on the 27th, arrived here last evening. She brings nothing of interest.

headline.main: From Havana.; ARRIVAL OF THE ST. LOUIS--NAVAL MEMORANDA--EXECUTION OF MURDERERS--THE MARKETS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship St. Louis, Capt. CAVENDY, from New-Orleans on the 24th, stopping at Havana on the 27th, arrived here last evening. She brings nothing of interest.
